Agent Conversation Metrics

GET

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v2/accounts/{account_id}/reports/conversations/ \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

403

404

Copy

```
[\
  {\
    "id": 123,\
    "name": "<string>",\
    "email": "<string>",\
    "thumbnail": "<string>",\
    "availability": "<string>",\
    "metric": {\
      "open": 123,\
      "unattended": 123\
    }\
  }\
]
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/agent-conversation-metrics#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/agent-conversation-metrics#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

#### Query Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/agent-conversation-metrics#parameter-type)

type

enum<string>

required

Type of report

Available options:

`agent`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/agent-conversation-metrics#parameter-user-id)

user\_id

string

The numeric ID of the user

#### Response

200

200403404

application/json

Success

id

number

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/agent-conversation-metrics#response-name)

name

string

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/agent-conversation-metrics#response-email)

email

string

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/agent-conversation-metrics#response-thumbnail)

thumbnail

string

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/reports/agent-conversation-metrics#response-availability)

availability

string

object

Show child attributes
